review.comment: Mindset media has taken my online business presence to another level. Julian came highly recommended to me and all I can say is WOW! What a difference he’s made. My business is ranking higher and higher every month which is translating to more business. I appreciate everything Julian does for me and my business and if I can give 6 stars I would.
review.review_reply: Hey, Ali!  We love helping you take out your competition in the Google rankings haha!  Thank you for the kind words and for taking a moment to leave this awesome 5-star rating!!
Thanks for the 5-star rating, Ashley!  It's always enjoyable working with you and your team.

review.comment: Julian has been handling my social media for a couple of years now and I would highly recommend.
review.review_reply: It is always fun to write blogs for your industry because I'm genuinely interested in the topics.  I'm glad you're also happy with the social media side of things.  Thank you so much for the 5-star rating!

review.comment: Prompt, professional and skilled ! Always going above and beyond.! Highly recommend!
review.review_reply: Hey, Jeff!  Thank you for the kind words and for the 5-star rating.  Have a great rest of the week 🙌

review.comment: Been working with Mindset Media for over 9years. Exceptionally happy with his service to me and our company. I would highly recommend these folks to all
review.review_reply: Hey, Indy!  It has been awesome working with you and your team for so many years.  We like the dynamics of all the different avenues we get to work within in your industry.  Whether it is an actual expo or just executing our digital marketing plans - we enjoy working with you.  Thanks for the 5-star review!

review.comment: I can hardly believe some of the results Mindset Media gets. Huge gains in organic traffic and SEO. I've seen it multiple times over the years so it's definitely not a fluke. If you need to boost your online presence, here's 100% where you should start.
review.review_reply: Hey, Taylor!  Boosting traffic for clients is what we have been doing the longest out of all of our services.  Thank you for  the kind words and 5-star rating!
Thanks for the 5-star rating, Miranda!  Have an awesome weekend 🙌

review.comment:
This guy is awesome, never ever had a media guy work so effectively, honestly and hard.  Had plenty of media people and I've never had anyone work as hard as Mindset Media.  I've truly felt like I was taking advantage of him with how hard he works.  Honestly and truly Mindset Media puts all other media companies that I have worked with to shame...  It might cross your mind that you're paying a bit more then other places but what you're really getting is a company that works 20x harder than their best competitors.

I have had more one on one meetings with Julian then almost all my other advertising and website guys combined.  He actually listens and makes changes right there while we're talking.  He cares, he listens and he has incredible talent.

If you're smart and if you can afford it you will hire Mindset Media.  I've been to the major players, the specialty guys you name it.  I've never had anyone treat me so well so consistently.  Don't spend your money anywhere else!
review.review_reply: Hey, Ashton!  With local clients we like to spend time one-on-one as much as possible because it really makes a difference.  Doing business is all about relationship building and that's best done in person.  Thank you so much for this great review!  See you soon!
